text: Susana Guízar (1922–1997) was a Mexican film actress.Arredondo p.90 ==Selected filmography== * Neither Blood Nor Sand (1941) * The Two Orphans (1944) * Lady Windermere's Fan (1944) * The House of the Fox (1945) * The Associate (1946) * Madam Temptation (1948) * Dawn of Life (1950) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Isabel Arredondo. Motherhood in Mexican Cinema, 1941-1991: The Transformation of Femininity on Screen. McFarland, 2013. ==External links== * Category:1922 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Mexican film actresses Category:Actresses from Michoacán Category:People from Pátzcuaro
title: Susana Guízar
